author: rwesten
msg: STANBOL-868: Added Solr ResourceLoader implementation that supports loading resources from the Stanbol DataFileProvider and an other that allows to explicitly parse the Classloader to be used for loading/instantiating Solr components. The later also supports setting a parent so that it can be used in combination with the first one. Currently those ResourceLoaders are not yet used by the commons.solr.core module as the Constructor that allows explicitly setting the ResourceLoader for Solr has package level visibility.

author: rwesten
msg: STANBOL-849: corrected wrong package name for the lucene labeltokenizer (incl. renaming of the smartzn labeltokenizer configuration to reflect the new package name STANBOL-856); STANBOL-866: The Lucene LabelTokenizer now supports CharFilter; STANBOL-867: The Lucene LabelTokenizer now supports configuration parameter; STANBOL-871: The LabelTokenizer of the EntityLinkingEngine can now be reset

author: dsmiley
msg: SOLR-4231: AbstractSpatialFieldType extensibility, and throw 400 code for invalid shapes
